testsuite.name: userFeatures.spec

testcase.name: user is redirected to login page after successful signup
user receives an error if username field is empty
user receives an error if email is invalid
user cannot sign up with an already existing username
user cannot sign up with an already exisiting email
user receives an error if password is incorrect
User is Redirected to dashboard page after successful login
user receives an error if recipe name field for add recipe is empty
user cannot add recipe with the same recipe name
Users can view and favorite recipe
user can upvote and downvote recipe
Users can edit and delete recipe
user can view and edit profile and logout
